author: pdobacz
content:
In `evmone` it is somewhat WIP at this point, I will take a look at this.

In terms of the megaspec and (EIP3540) however, it seems to have been designed as a "light failure" (not abort). There's a discrepancy, since it marks `0` as the correct status code to return, when by EIP-7069's `EXTDELEGATECALL` spec it should be `1` (same as revert ☝️ )
